snippet: The Detroit Lions on Wednesday gave Calvin Johnson an eight-year extension worth up to $132 million, the most for a receiver in history.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Detroit Lions give wide receiver Calvin Johnson an eight-year extension worth up to $132 million, the most for a receiver in history; other NFL items noted.
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Lions on Wednesday gave Calvin Johnson an eight-year extension worth up to $132 million, the most for a receiver in history.

headline.seo: Lions Give Calvin Johnson a Record Extension
headline.main: Receiver Is Given a Record Extension
headline.print_headline: Lions Receiver Is Given A Record Extension
